items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t have the faintest idea what Mary is trying to do.
Tom did his best to persuade Mary to go to the dance with him.
Where is the notebook that I left here on the table yesterday?
I think I have almost enough money to buy the computer I want.
If he had known her phone number, he could have called her up.
Are you sure that you don\'t want to go to Australia with Tom?
Do you think it\'s dangerous to eat genetically modified food?
Have I ever told you guys about the first time I went camping?
Have you been back to Boston since you graduated from college?
Have you ever been to that Japanese restaurant on Park Street?
